tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: 全球最大的代码托管平台，开源项目的家园

tools.name: Cloudflare
tools.description: CDN、DNS、安全防护一站式服务，Workers 无服务器计算平台
tools.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path d='M13 10V3L4 14h7v7l9-11h-7z'/></svg>

tools.name: VS Code
tools.description: 微软出品的轻量级代码编辑器，插件生态丰富
tools.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><rect width='18' height='18' x='3' y='3' rx='2' ry='2'/><polyline points='9 10 9 9 10 9'/></svg>

tools.name: Vercel
tools.description: 前端项目部署平台，支持 Next.js、Astro 等框架一键部署
tools.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path d='M21 16V8a2 2 0 0 0-1-1.73l-7-4a2 2 0 0 0-2 0l-7 4A2 2 0 0 0 3 8v8a2 2 0 0 0 1 1.73l7 4a2 2 0 0 0 2 0l7-4A2 2 0 0 0 21 16z'/><polyline points='7.5 4.21 12 6.81 16.5 4.21'/><polyline points='7.5 19.79 7.5 14.6 3 12'/><polyline points='21 12 16.5 14.6 16.5 19.79'/><polyline points='3.27 6.96 12 12.01 20.73 6.96'/><line x1='12' x2='12' y1='22.08' y2='12'/></svg>

tools.name: Figma
tools.description: 在线协作设计工具，UI/UX 设计师必备
tools.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path d='M21 12a9 9 0 1 1-6.219-8.56'/></svg>

tools.name: Notion
tools.description: All-in-one 笔记和协作工具，支持数据库、看板等功能

tools.name: ChatGPT
tools.description: OpenAI 的 AI 对话助手，编程、写作、学习的好帮手

tools.name: Claude
tools.description: Anthropic 的 AI 助手，擅长长文本处理和代码分析
tools.icon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><path d='M12 2a3 3 0 0 0-3 3v7a3 3 0 0 0 6 0V5a3 3 0 0 0-3-3Z'/><path d='M19 10v2a7 7 0 0 1-14 0v-2'/><line x1='12' x2='12' y1='19' y2='22'/></svg>
